name: The Incredible BAM Boys
description:
BAM Boys is a 4-player action platformer where players compete in a series of arena events for fun and for bragging rights. The game supports local multiplayer only but is compatible with Xbox 360 controllers on the PC.

Game modes include CLASSIC ARENA, which involves surviving against enemies and your fellow players and collecting coins, TAG, HIDE & SEEK, and PIT. Though local multiplayer features are all fully functional, the game also does offer an experimental single-player or COURSE mode, though this feature is a work-in-progress.

All in all, if you're a fan of retro games and looking for a fun 4-player game this one can be loads of fun!
